channel.title: Editing Item Bonuses, Item Masks, Shops, and Custom NPCs Matrix 704
channel.description: How do I go about doing these things? I heard there's a special program you need to use to edit the values. And what about shops and such? And how do I get custom NPC spawns, with custom stats and hitpoints?
